channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Now that the megabill has passed, expect a ton of short-term debt to be sold to finance the government’s deficit
item.description: Wall Street will be watching to see how new Treasury supply to fund the U.S. deficit will be absorbed.

item.title: You’re running out of time to buy an EV before Trump’s big bill kills the $7,500 tax credit on electric vehicles
item.description: The $7,500 tax credit that car shoppers can use for new EV purchases is set to expire at the end of September, according to the tax and spending bill ...

item.title: Will Trump’s megabill cut your taxes? Check this number on your tax return for the answer.
item.description: Tax breaks in the megabill, like no taxes on tips and overtime, only apply to people at certain income levels.

item.title: My job is offering me a payout. Should I take a $61,000 lump sum — or $355 a month for life?
item.description: “My S&P 500 investments have roughly doubled every seven years.”

item.title: Re-risking your portfolio: Investor John Davi's picks for the second half of 2025
item.description: Davi advises investors to look away from popular ETFs such as SPY and VOO and instead at ETFs in industrials, energy, real estate and fixed income.

item.title: This semiconductor stock could have more room to run after a strong first half, says UBS
item.description: Shares have gained more than 11% so far in 2025.
